name: Food Republic
address: Lot 1.41.00 - 1.51.00 & P1.13.00 - P1.20.00, Level 1, Gourmet Emporium
description:
Food Republic was founded on the concept of serving well-loved street food at affordable prices housed in the air-conditioned comfort of shopping malls. With the opening of the first outlet in Malaysia at Pavilion KL, the brand revolutionised the food court scene in Malaysia, introducing the quintessential integrated open-dining food atrium experience, featuring detailed décor & ambience, while bringing together the best of hawker fare and restaurant dining under a single roof.
Promoting the appreciation of cultures and heritage in Asian cuisine, Food Republic appeals to diners seeking a harmony of flavours and vibrant mix of cuisines, experienced and shared under one roof while providing an immersive experience for all senses, including ‘live’ cooking featured through each stall’s open-kitchen concept.
Tourist Privilege:10% off normal price items.(Click for more info)

name: Cloud 9
description: Located on the top floor, Cloud 9 introduces a one-of-a-kind contemporary fine dining experience overlooking the bustle of Bukit Bintang. With a kitchen headed by celebrity Korean chef Ryan Lee who boasts intricate culinary skills, the lofty restaurant brings you a dining experience of new heights with a myriad of Asian-inspired French dishes that promise to tantalize your taste buds.

name: Chez Choux
description: Chez Choux means “at the home of puff” in French. We strive to provide the most delicious cream puffs to the world! Our products are freshly baked everyday with fresh, natural ingredients as we are fully committed in giving our customers products of the highest quality. The crispiness and crunchiness of our puffs, combined with our fresh and rich custard cream will keep you coming back for more!

name: KyoChon
description:
Our fried chicken has been South Korea’s favourite for more than 20 years, and here’s why.
We fry every piece to order, giving you perfect, crispy skin and juicy, tender meat. We brush every piece with our special Korean sauces. We’re tastier.
We use canola oil to fry our fresh, drug-free chickens. We’re healthier.
We use only natural ingredients and no MSG. Ever. We’ve better quality.
Come and be chickenlightened at KyoChon!

name: FIVE GUYS
description:
It’s your meal, so FIVE GUYS believes that you should get exactly what you want. That’s why FIVE GUYS has more than 250,000 possible topping combinations for you Burgers, Hotdogs and Sandwiches. Not to mention 1,000 different Shake mix-in combinations. The famous fries are a ‘boardwalk style’ fry, meaning they’re hand-cut on site each day and cooked in 100% peanut oil, will you go for Five Guys Style or spice things up with the Cajun fries
Opening soon at Connection, Level 3 on 11 April 2022.

name: KGB – Killer Gourmet Burgers
description:
KGB. Killer Gourmet Burgers, your casual dining space bursting with raw energy and creative handcrafted burgers, fries & desserts.Indulge in our chin-dripping juicy burgers, made with serious passion for the passionate.
After all, life is too short for a bad burger.

name: Arthur’s Storehouse
description:
Experience the magic of Arthur’s Storehouse – GuinnessMalaysia’s 1st Flagship Outlet.
Learn about the brand’s rich history while enjoying theWorld’s No. 1 Stout alongside Guinness-infused food, cocktails, and even getyour hands on exclusive merchandise.
It is time to step into the world of Guinness, right here inthe heart of KL.

name: Garrett Popcorn Shops
description:
Garrett Popcorn Shops® – A Chicago Tradition from the USA since 1949
For over seven decades, Garrett Popcorn Shops has served gourmet popcorn using wholesome ingredients in their secret family recipes, passed down for generations. Custom grown, non-GMO butterfly and mushroom kernels are first hot-air popped in their kitchens, then enriched with flavor in seasoned, old-fashioned Copper Kettles. Because good things take time, Garrett Popcorn is handcrafted in small batches throughout the day.
Signature recipes include the fan-invented, original Chicago-style popcorn, Chicago Mix®, which blends the sweetness of CaramelCrisp™ with the savory goodness of CheeseCorn; plus Buttery (a vegan treat!), Plain, CheeseCorn, CaramelCrisp, Almond CaramelCrisp and Macadamia CaramelCrisp.
Like no other™, Garrett Popcorn enchants adoring fans around the world.

name: Harriston Chocolatier Cafe
description:
Step into the irresistible realm of Harriston Chocolatier! Here, chocolate dreams come alive, surprising your senses with every divine bite. It’s an endless flavour adventure, brimming with delightful surprises and delectable treats from a treasured homegrown brand!

Location: Lot 2.75.00 Level 2, Pavilion Kuala Lumpur
Contact: +6017-843 9123

name: Nespresso
description: Welcome to the world of Nespresso. Let’s begin your journey of indulgence and share all your coffee moments right here with #NespressoMY

name: O’Galito
description: Serving Mediterranean food, O’Galito combines the classic with the contemporary to achieve bold, exciting and comforting flavour. Take a gastronomic journey through the real Mediterranean taste!

name: Gigi Coffee
description: A simple start to all things happy, we’re your friendly coffee makers that make bad days good again. Gigi Coffee serves up quality and affordable cups of coffee-fixes for people on-the-go, be it a freshly brewed coffee or silky smooth Nitro Cold Brew Coffee. Liven up the experience by adding milk, capping with subtle sweet cream or adding chewy brown sugar boba! Infused with all things happy, they’re all about making everyone’s day a little brighter.

name: Coolblog
description:
Since 2005, Coolblog served some of the best tasting, high quality and affordable desserts and beverages in your neighbourhood. It is true for us then as it is now.
That is why we are committed to provide unmatched customer experience through our service, products, value & availability; we make it as easy and accessible as possible for our franchisees to own and operate their own business and we create an environment for our employees to build and grow their careers.
Everything we do starts from one belief: everyone can treat themselves with the very best whenever they want to and as often as they like.

name: Rotiboy
description: The first Rotiboy was a neighbourhood bakery which baked fresh breads and loafs for household, kids to bring to school, cakes for birthdays celebrations, home-makers were our best friends. Filled with butter and topped with coffee flavored topping, Rotiboy it is a bun like no other. A signature Mexican coffee bun that’s crispy on the outside, moist and sweet on the inside.

name: Ichiban Boshi
description: A meeting place for diners who truly enjoy a Japanese meal. With the contemporary design and cozy ambience, enjoy a wide selection of sushi, sashimi as well as cooked dishes and desserts. There are monthly promotion menus such as Chef’s Recommendation and Japanese festival set meals.

name: La Boca – Latino Bar
description: Discover the dazzling flavours and vibrant cultures of Central & South America at “LA BOCA” Latino Bar. There is only ONE La Boca Latino Bar. We are an authentic Latin American Restaurant & Bar famed for our friendly atmosphere, authentic Latino food & beverage, awesome latin music, personalized service (handsome waiters) and great parties. Our genuine South American atmosphere creates the ideal environment for special occasions and celebration parties.

name: Two Sons Bistro
description: Two Sons Bistro offers diners a blend of Western and Asian cuisine in a sophisticated, rustic environment. Watch the talented chefs dish out their masterpieces from Two Sons Bistro’s open kitchen while you savour juicy steaks with its exciting array of accompaniments, or get your hands dirty dipping into our clams and mussels prepared in a variety of sauces.

name: Croissant Taiyaki
description:
The hottest “hybrid” premium dessert from Japan which created a storm in Bangkok, has finally landed in Malaysia!
Taiyaki is a traditional Japanese fish-shaped cake that’s usually filled with red bean paste, but Croissant Taiyaki’s version comes with a buttery puff pastry to give it a croissant-like texture.
While red bean is clearly the favourite, you may want to try the triple hybrid version which includes a scoop of matcha ice-cream, called Ice Taiyaki!
Available in 6 flavours, all Croissant Taiyaki’s products are pork-free.
At an affordable price starting from RM6.50, go ahead and start snacking – you may end up ordering the world-famous Gindaco piping hot takoyaki just next doors too!

name: Hokkaido Ramen Santouka
description:
Hokkaido Ramen Santouka was established in 1988 in Asahikawa, Hokkaido. Santouka founder – Hitoshi Hatanaka wanted to develop a classic ramen for all to enjoy, made with a simple soup that could be savored to the last, spoonful and topped with a fabulous char-siu pork. In essence, a masterfully assembled ramen whose superior ingredients and magnificient, robust flavor would truly stand out and long-lasting.

Pavilion Junior Privilege:Free ice cream with any purchase of regular ramen or ramen set(Click for more info)

name: TAI ER Suancai & Fish
description:
Tai Er is a Chinese restaurant chain specialising in suan cai yu, aka sauerkraut fish, with over 400 outlets in its native China.
Opening its first Malaysia branch in Pavilion Kuala Lumpur, Tai Er is well-known for its signature soupy sauerkraut fish, which is served in different sizes ranging from an individual portion to a gigantic platter known as the Feaster. The spicy mala soup is loaded with Sichuan peppercorns, dried chillies, sauerkraut, filleted tilapia and a sprinkling of chrysanthemum petals for extra drama.

name: Zok Noodle House
description:
Zok Noodle House was established in 2011 by a group of four buddies.

They are both ambitious and keen to create an epicurean authentic HK & Macau gourmet experience with the combination of their house’s recipe.

Zok Noodle House endeavors to prepare foods with the best available ingredients which also the meaning of “Zok” in Chinese.

Signature dumpling noodles are something that you should never miss.

name: Al-Amar Lebanese Cuisine
description:
Experience the exquisite taste of the Middle East in Al-Amar Lebanese Cuisine. Al-Amar, ’the moon’ in Arabic, provides a relaxed city-chic atmosphere during the day, and turns romantic with warm mood lighting at night. Expect to enjoy immaculately-prepared authentic Lebanese cuisine as you take in the vibrant view of the busy shopping district from its stylish terrace. Al-Amar’s team of highly experienced Lebanese chefs promise delight at the first culinary bite and all throughout your dining escape with them. With some of the freshest ingredients flown in from Lebanon, Al-Amar prides itself on serving some of the finest cuisine available in this city.
Pavilion Lifestyle, Priority, and Luxe:Enjoy 10% off the total bill.(Click here for more information)
Tourist Privileges: Enjoy 10% off the total bill.(Click here for more information.)

name: Kampachi
description:
Exquisite Japanese cuisine presented as an art form.
The freshest fish – all air-flown directly from Tokyo and Osaka fish market weekly are delicately laid on ice bed.
Savour tantalising sashimi and other delectable spread at Kampachi.

name: Yolé
description:
Yolé, the first NO SUGAR ADDED frozen yogurt and ice cream from Spain which has less calories, fats and sugar than any other brand in the ice cream market. With the use of premium natural ingredients, we have created rich, full-flavored ice cream without adding any sugar. After thousands of hours’ worth of the expert research, we were able to use Spain’s finest ingredients to develop a unique recipe for the perfect ice-cream, full of taste, no sugar added.
For Yolé, quality is always their top priority on creating great tasting frozen yogurt and ice cream recipes that you’ll be able to enjoy more often and keep your waistline in check at the same time. Life is better with healthy delicious frozen yogurt and ice cream to fill yourself with more momentary joy which is harmless in almost every aspect.

name: Grandmama’s
description:
The Grandmama’s at Pavilion is one of the restaurants in the mall for the local as well as tourists. They serve signature local cuisines such as nasi lemak, nasi ayam istimewa, fried kueh teow, curry fish head, hakka fried rice and etc. The choice of food is Malaysian local cuisine depict of multi races country.
The naming of Grandmama’s brought back the memories of our grandma used to cook the food in its more authentic presence. In Grandmama’s food is still authentic but dining experience has been uplifted.

name: Weissbrau
description: Weissbrau provides everything from pork knuckles and ribs to cold cuts and sausages galore – a German Bistro with a very casual atmosphere in a semi-open air space. They have a variety of beer on tap like Carlsberg, Hoegaarden, Franziskaner and Leffe Blonde, and also bottled beer like Paulaner, Lowenbrau, Becks, Konid Ludwig and Grolsch.

name: Ho Min San
description:
Ho Min San is a noodles restaurant that is exclusively presented to meet the contemporary food cultures and preferences of customers by serving the authentic noodles imported from China and a variety of traditional, authentic dishes of Yunnan and Sichuan. They aim to provide exquisite products, thoughtful services and comfortable atmosphere to create the sensation of “creative fusion noodles”.
Check out our ‘#DinnerDateDestination featuring Ho Min San’ feature here.

name: Vanilla Mille Crepe
description: Vanilla Mille Crepe serves famous Paris-based Mille Crepes in a charming garden-like setting.

name: CHICHA San Chen
description: An award-winning bubble tea brand that uses only the best ingredients and tea brewing techniques of the highest standard, CHICHA SanChen makes accessible and modernizes the tea-drinking experience that satisfies the desire for both traditional and bubble tea.

name: D Empire
description: Authentic European cuisine right in the heart of KL’s Golden Triangle. Their chef has over 20 years experience overseas and over 4 years in Malaysia. He puts all his knowledge and heart into preparing each and every meal from the wide selection of European meaty and seafood dishes along with delicious desserts to excite everyone’s taste buds. The chef always makes sure that every dish is served at its finest whether by buying imported dairy or selecting the freshiest ingredients and by prepairing his own made sauces. They belief that good ingredients make good food. That’s why they are so focus on selecting the fresh and quality ingredients. All their seafoods are freshly imported from Europe country.

name: Baskin 31 Robbins
description: As a leader in flavor innovation, Baskin Robbins offers over 1,000 flavors of ice cream, including sugar free, fat free and light. Its menu also includes frozen yogurt, sorbets, sherbets, beverages, ice cream cakes, sundaes and hand-packed for every occasion. Baskin Robbins intend to stay ‘Malaysian’s Favorite Premium Ice Cream’ in every way.

name: Pizza Hut
description: At Pizza Hut, be ready to choose a line of different flavours pizza. Featuring a delicious mix of nutritious Italian-American cuisine that includes the world’s favourite pan pizza and other delectable dishes, Pizza Hut never stops at exploring more flavours to cater to the masses. Pull your cheese up high and enjoy the pan hot pizza!

name: Madam Kwan’s
description:
Famous for its’ Nasi Lemak, Madam Kwan’s is one of the must-try restaurants in town. The restaurant brings out the Malaysian’s flavors by serving a fusion of local dishes. Dine in and enjoy the rich fragrant of sambal, Asam Laksa and Curry Laksa Mee. Madam Kwan’s gives a satisfying Malaysian dining experience to all.
Pavilion Lifestyle, Priority, and Luxe Privilege:Enjoy complimentary Sago Melaka when dine-in.(Click for more info)
Tourist Privileges: Free Sago Gula Melaka(Click here for more)
*Terms and conditions apply

name: Kenangan Coffee
description: Kenangan Coffee is the first newretail F&B Unicorn in Southeast Asia. As the fastest growing grab-and-gocoffee chain with more than 800 stores in Indonesia, Kenangan Coffee is knownfor the signature Kenangan Latte and Kenangan Blend coffee beans. They alsooffer tea, chocolate, and a wide variety of food menu items.

name: Melvados
description: Melvados was built to meet the rising needs of food-loving Malaysian residents who are too busy to whip up a gourmet meal for themselves. 100% made in Malaysia, its our own passion for food that led us to create a host of ready to eat meals and delicious desserts perfect for hectic days at work, to feed busy school children, for dinner parties, potlucks and even BBQs. Fully cooked, all our products simply require heating for instant gratification! We are Halal certified.

name: Okonomi by Tokyo Don
description: An informal restaurant evoking the vibrant atmosphere and casual vibes of downtown Tokyo. House specials by resident teppan specialist and chef Takeshi Wada include okonomiyaki, yakiniku, yakisoba, teppan set meals and multi-course meals amongst others.

name: Canton Court
description: Canton Court redefines Cantonese fine dining as a premier culinary destination, seamlessly merging authentic flavours withmodern sophistication. Savour exquisite cuisine, expertly crafted by our chef with precision and artistry, in an elegantambiance complemented by impeccable service.

name: LAC Nutrition For Life
description:
LAC, short for Leader in Anti-oxidative Control, is a leading health and wellness supplement brand with a global presence.
In 1997, the world began realising how critical antioxidants are for good health. LAC was then born to fill that market’s need for the most powerful antioxidant.
Since its founding, LAC has embarked on a pioneering journey to develop scientifically based formulas, harnessing the best of eastern wisdom and western technology to neutralise free radicals, combat ageing brought forth by oxidative stress, and support you daily in looking, feeling, and functioning at your best.
Today, LAC has over 100 nutraceutical products focusing on the 5 fundamentals – Beauty, Anti-ageing, Immunity, Energy, and Weight Management – bringing consumers unparalleled solutions for their everyday health and wellness.

name: Geo Wine Nat
description: A great place for after work drinks, with a fine selection of wines, liquor and beer on tap, paired with a delicious made-from-scratch food menu. Live performances liven up the atmosphere making this a great pit-stop.

name: Semangkuk Mi Tarik Lanzhou Lamian China
description: Savour the authentic flavors of China at Semangkuk Mi Tarik Lanzhou Lamian—a Chinese Muslim restaurant where hand-pulled noodles are crafted with precision, offering a delectable journey through Lanzhou’s culinary heritage.

name: Dolly Dim Sum
description:
Dolly Dim Sum is our modern interpretation of a traditional Chinese teahouse. It is a contemporary dim sum house that offers an all-day grazing experience of authentic Cantonese-style dim sum.
Dim sum literally means “”to touch the heart””; and to us, dim sum is an art form – each piece is delicate and exquisite, much like a “”dolly””.

name: RedTail
description: Offering the perfect setting for pre-club drinks and group celebrations, RedTail boasts exciting features including a Beer bar, Tiki bar, and light meals and snacks.

name: HWC Coffee
description:
The story of HWC Coffee began in 2016, when an enthusiastic coffee cupper, a green coffee buyer and roasters jointly established the company. During the year, they managed to set up three retail stores and a roasting factory, enabling them to have full control of product development.
To ensure customers could enjoy a cup of high-quality specialty coffee, the company imposes a stringent process from bean cultivation, roasting quality, to the cupping. HWC Coffee hopes coffee could serve as a medium to connect people with nature, thereby reflecting the real coffee value and coffee economics (coffenomics).
Coffee is shareable with everyone that enables us to embrace happiness.

name: Right Side
description:
BURGER, TACOS, MILKSHAKES, WRAPS, NUGGETS & SOFT SERVE ICE CREAM
100% PLANT MADE & TASTY!

name: Tom&Danny Coffee
description: Tom&Danny is a coffee shop created by founder Tom and Darren together. Tom&Danny hopes to provide quality and tasteful coffee. Let coffee culture permeate people’s lifestyles, with the ultimate pursuit of innovation and quality of life, and continue to explore the unlimited possibilities of coffee and lifestyle. Of course, Tom&Danny not only does in-depth research on coffee, but they are also constantly innovating on food and catering to the needs of the market. Let people not only enjoy good coffee but also have a good food mix.

name: illy Caffè
description:
illy Caffè, a well-known Italian coffee brand established in 1933, is located in The Pavilion KL Mall, one of Kuala Lumpur’s top shopping destinations. Its contemporary and chic design creates an inviting ambiance where customers can unwind and relax. illy Caffè’s skilled baristas are always ready to cater to your coffee preferences, ensuring you receive a perfect cup every time. They even provide a meeting room for your professional requirements.
illy Caffè offers various coffee blends, which are made from high-quality coffee beans sourced from top coffee-growing regions worldwide. Customers can also select from a range of food options such as sandwiches, pastries, and cakes that complement the coffee experience.
Aside from its exceptional coffee and food selection, illy Caffè also retails a variety of coffee machines and accessories for customers to enjoy the Illy coffee experience at home. Whether you’re a coffee lover or simply seeking a venue to enjoy a fantastic cup of coffee, illy Caffè at The Pavilion KL Mall is an ideal choice.
Pavilion Lifestyle, Priority, Luxe:Enjoy all-day 25% off on Coffee.(Click here for more)

name: Rocku Yakiniku
description: ROCKU Yakiniku is a casual, yet edgy Japanese BBQ buffet restaurant, infused with live modern entertainment – delivering a brand new concept of “restaurantainment” to Malaysia. Guests can savour the classic Japanese Yakiniku (BBQ) culinary style in a smoke-free charcoal grill experience while enjoying live music performances and various unique entertainment such as magic shows and game shows.

name: Xiangshan Fish Steamboat
description: Xiangshan Fish Steamboat is a unique culinary experience, slow-simmered in traditional wooden barrels with fresh fish, heated stones, green pepper, and a medley of aromatic ingredients, creating a rich and flavourful broth.

name: Nyonya Colors
description: Nyonya Colors specializes in premium homemade quality Nyonya Kueh and delights. It aims to provide customers with the highest quality and tasty Nyonya Kueh. Almost all the Nyonya Kueh, desserts and meals are produced in the central kitchen to achieve consistency in taste and good quality control. Only the best and freshest ingredients are used to make the products.

name: % Arabica
description: % Arabica first store in Malaysia is here at Pavilion Kuala Lumpur. The store is equipped with our signature roasting machine, which you can select beans, quantity, and the roasting level, and the store will custom roast to each order so that you can bring home the freshest coffee in town.

name: myEureka Snack
description: Each Eureka popcorn flavor has undergone intensive research before they are sold in the market. Eureka keeps a high-quality of control to bring you the best from the ingredients. Eureka Snack Bar have tailored recipes to suit to your taste buds and at the same time, give you a burst of flavor each time you have one of their popcorns.

name: Ippudo
description:
The renowned Japanese Ramen chain is now in Malaysia!
Ippudo’s signature tonkotsu ramen soup is free of the usual smell of pork with a light aftertaste. The selection of ingredients and the seasoning suited to the customer’s well-being has won over female customers tempting them to want to try it everyday. Ippudo was also the first to refer to broth by color, Shiro (white) and Aka (red), which soon became a standard industry practice. Till today, Shiromaru and Akamaru continue to helm as Ippudo’s signature ramen.

Pavilion Junior Privilege:Receive a complimentary Kid’s Meal add-on with any Kid’s Meal main order.(Click for more info)

name: Daily Kopitiam
description: Reminiscent the good old days at Daily Kopitiam. Savour their traditional kopitiam menu such as prawn noodles, nasi lemak, curry mee or freshly-baked egg tarts along with a cup of coffee or tea.

name: RasaNya Steamboat
description:
Recalling the vibrant days of the Peranakans – a cultural hotpot swirling with Chinese, Malay, and Western heritage. Woven in the centre of this rich heritage is Nya, who binds her family through a deep love: expressed in humble yet intricate cooking.
ClickHEREto view the menu.

name: Hansang
description:
Best of the best Hansang.
confidence  customer satisfaction.
We are seeking  a new style never done before!
There are not only taste & shape but  in Hansang.
Premium Gimbap!
One roll of premium Gimbap contains all required nutrients of one day of modern people.

name: Shuyi
description: Drinks that are nutritious and delicious, made with high-quality ingredients. The perfect choice when you want something sweet and refreshing.

name: Dai Cha Dim
description: Serving a delicious variety of cha-chaan-teng delights, you’ll find many scrumptious comfort food such as BBQ meat noodles , dimsum, plated rice, , double boiler soup, desserts , bottled milk tea and more. The perfect place for a fuss-free taste of crazy rich flavours! (non halal)

name: Al Halabi Express
description: Al Halabi Express provides authentic Arabic and Middle Eastern food selections to satisfy all your senses. They serve a variety of kebabs or biryani rice done the Middle Eastern way, steamed with herbs and spices to ensure a flavourful tasty meal for their customers.

name: The Chicken Rice Shop
description:
The Chicken Rice Shop serves traditionally preparedsteamed, roasted, honey barbecued and soy sauce chicken as its signaturedishes. These signature dishes are served with fluffy chicken flavoured ricecooked to perfection from a recipe passed down through the generations,originating from Hainan Island.
The tagline “Chicken Rice and More…” serves as the commitment to guests in offering a wide variety of local favouritesincluding noodle dishes, curries, Special Penang Chai Boay (Spicy MixedVegetables), Nyonya Assam Fish and Kerabu Mango, as as well as appetizers suchas Famous Stuffed Fishball, Penang Rojak and Gado-Gado.

name: Matcha Hero Kyoto
description:
Taste the richness of Japanese green tea ice cream and drinks made from Marukyu Koyamaen Green Tea.

Pavilion Junior Privilege:Add-on ice cream for only RM1 (Matcha, Houjicha or Matcha & Houjicha flavours)(Click for more info)

name: Ralph’s Coffee
description: Ralph’s Coffee represents the timeless American spirit of the Ralph Lauren brand. Custom blends crafted from the world’s finest organic coffee beans. Ralph’s special blends, including Ralph’s Roast, Decaf, and Espresso, feature organically grown beans from Central and South America and Africa.

name: Food Place
description:
Situated in Pavilion Kuala Lumpur, 8 Avenue offers non-halallocal delicacies and tasty dishes from international cuisine. 8 Avenue also creates unforgettable dining experiences with friendly service at competitive prices.
No need to search around for the classic local dishes anymore, 8 Avenue atPavilion KL offers you the chance to savor the taste of the golden oldies ofthe best local favourites and international cuisine, all under one roof. 17 ofthe eateries’ renowned brands such as Petaling Street Hokkien Mee, Kee Mei SiewPow, Min Bak Kut Teh Authentic from Klang, Tang Jia Roast, Lucky Fountain, OJATropical Island Drink, Old Master Q Beef Noodle, Fullbud Taiwanese Cuisine, HupKee Claypot & Hotplate, Wonder Soup, KimHot Dumpling, Wei Hong Ipoh HorFun, Li Ji Lala Noodle, Yong Tau Fu, Kenko Life, Sedap Syok and Kepong AhGoGoCurry Fish Head.
Don’t miss out on this one-of-a-kind gastronomic adventure!

name: Godiva
description:
Engage all your senses with the wonder of chocolate!
Savour fine chocolate at Godiva as it brings you a range of refined flavors with Rich, crispy biscuits, hot cocoa, and gourmet coffee from Godiva can be a most satisfying after-dinner experience or a special indulgence with friends.

Pavilion Lifestyle, Priority, Luxe:Enjoy a complimentary Godiva soft serve with purchase of RM 250 in a single receipt.(Click for more info)– Year Long Privileges start 1/1/2023

name: Grand Imperial
description:
Established since 2008, Grand Imperial is Malaysia’s leading company in the food and beverage industry. Over the years, the restaurant has grown by leaps and bounds, and is now a household name synonymous with exquisite culinary offerings and excellent ambience and other food-related products and services.
The company showcases a fleet of outstanding restaurants offering various culinary experiences, from Chinese delicacies to Chinese Dim Sum, BBQ, Seafood Steamboat, Hong Kong noodles, and tangy fresh seafood.
Grand Imperial’s latest restaurant here at Pavilion KL offers comfortable and spacious seating in a modern setting, perfect for family meals and banquets. Equipped with a big LED screen on stage, the couples can expect a romantic 5-star exclusive wedding experience here at Pavilion KL.
Operation Hours:
11:30am – 3:00pm, 6:00pm – 10:30pm (Monday-Saturday)10:00am – 3:00pm, 6:00pm – 10:30pm (Sunday)

name: Pao Xiang Bah Kut Teh
description: Bak Kut Teh – the name literally translates as ’meat bone tea’, consisting of meaty pork ribs simmered in a complex broth of herbs and spices (including star anise, cinnamon, cloves, dang gui, fennel seeds and garlic) for hours. Pao Xiang Bak Kut Teh brings in the full flavours to warm your tummy with additional ingredients such as offal, varieties of mushroom and pieces of dried tofu or fried tofu puffs. Dine in with your family and friends is the best way to enjoy a pot of hot hearty meal.

name: Celadon Royal Thai Cuisine
description: Keeping traditions alive at Celadon Royal Thai Restaurant, indulge in this space filled with ancient Thai artifacts, complimented with true Thai cuisine, brilliantly prepared by experienced Thai chefs. Try the popular Green Curry, Tom Yam and other Thai specialties.

name: Ichi Zen Japanese Restaurant
description:
Ichi Zen, founded by Edo Ichi Group of Restaurants, contains two underlying concepts under its name, one being the heritage of ancient Edo period’s value towards food, and the other is the connotation of the name that literally meant ‘Edo Period’s number one meal’ in Japanese.
Abiding Edo Ichi’s brand qualities, Ichi Zen successfully transcended both the orthodox and innovation of Edo cuisine into a unique food approach composed of the purest ingredients. A long list of dishes comes with their menu, including made to order Sushi and custom pork dish which will freshen up your tongue while being served like an honorable.
Tourist Privileges:10% off normal-priced items*(Click for more info)
*Terms and conditions apply.

name: llaollao
description: Enjoy the llaollao experience with the most delicious toppings, all the sauces you can imagine and the freshest and most nutritious fruit. And cool off with the healthiest frozen yogurt.

name: Aori Ramen
description:
Unwind at Aori Ramen—a sanctuary designed with modern simplicity and relaxation at its core. Our zen and airy ambiance offers the ideal setting to savour the art of ramen perfection.
From the first sip to the last slurp, our flavorful broths are an integral part of the Aori Ramen experience. Our chefs pour countless hours into crafting our broths, unveiling a flavor profile that’s rich, nuanced, and utterly delightful. More than just a base, these broths are crafted for sipping and savoring, allowing you to experience the full spectrum of flavors.

name: Quivo
description:
Quivo has a style and attitude for all and appeals to all five senses.
Quivo allows you to be yourself and hopes to brighten your day. Embodying a Mediterranean lifestyle concept, every dish at Quivo is made with carefully sourced ingredients. Cooked authentically using only the finest ingredients, Quivo stays true to its traditional fundamentals. Olive oil that tastes of the Mediterranean, salt that is freshly packed, and coffee that is a unique home blend. With a focus on creative drinks and great wines, our mixologists have concocted cocktails to be enjoyed alone or complimentary to our menu. We specialise in food and drinks that will delight your palate. Quivo is a one-stop shop for customers, whether you are a KL-ite and a resident or a visitor staying in the area. It’s a place to relax.
Pavilion Lifestyle, Priority, Luxe:Enjoy 10% off a la carte menu.(Click for more info)– Year Long Privileges start 1/1/2023

name: Suki-ya
description: This “House of Hot Pot” is designed to offer heart-warming dining experiences at equally endearing prices. Diners enjoy unlimited, top-quality Australian chilled beef and farmed chicken that are oh-so-delicious in their own right. Another highlight of Suki-Ya is its vegetable bar featuring a wide variety of fresh vegetables to round up the meal with a healthy touch. Along with sumptuous soups and broths, dining at Suki-Ya is bound to perk up everyone’s taste buds. One of the latest brand new eatery launched by Creative Eateries! Sukiya or “House of hot pot” is designed to offer a fun and unpretentious dining experience.

name: Taimal Herbs & Medicine
description: We offer the best quality of Chinese herbs and medicine at a reasonable price. Check out our stores today!

name: Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant
description: Founded in 2020, Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant is a Hong Kong-style restaurant that not only serves authentic traditional Hong Kong-style cuisine but is also committed to combining tradition and innovation. They aim to develop special dishes based on the traditional Hong Kong restaurant culture and basis. And all of this is brought to their customers by the Hong Kong-style restaurant chefs with 25 years of experience who use professional and custom culinary art to create various types of unique Hong Kong-style cuisine of personal ingenuity.

name: Tokyo Teppan
description: A sister restaurant of Tokyo Don, Tokyo Teppan specializes in teppanyaki. Whether it is the salmon teppanyaki, or the Angus beef teppanyaki, or mixture of dishes, customers will be pleased by the competently prepared meal.

name: Nando’s
description:
Besides our legendary chicken, the one thing you’ll always find at Nando’s is a warm welcome that’ll make you feel right at home. And that’s not just because of our PERi-PERi!
Each one of our restaurants has its own special design, but they all have earthy textures and colours that remind us of our sunny Afro-Portuguese roots and many feature original South African art and unique design touches. Cool Afro-Luso beats and friendly service add to the vibe, and then there’s the piece-de- resistance – our flame-grilled PERi-PERi chicken that’s served on beautiful crockery.
It makes for a sizzling experience and we can’t wait for you to join our table. Because if there’s one thing we love just as much as PERi-PERi, it’s big, happy gatherings!

name: KFC
description:
Great tasting chicken has become synonymous with KFC.
They serves finger lickin’ good, succulent pieces of chicken with flavourful blends of 11 herbs and spices give KFC’s delicious aroma. With the chicken’s natural juices sealed-in, leaving a special mouth-watering taste that cannot be replaced.

name: Yun Nans
description: YUNNANS is China’s largest casual restaurant chain with over 200 outlets. More than 1 million Signature Chicken Soup sold worldwide!

name: Taco James
description:
Taco James is a taco-based fast food restaurant. And they’re here to serve the best taco in town.
Taco Tuesday? TACO JAMES every day!

name: The Barn
description: A home for great wines and a smorgasbord of exquisite cuisine crafted to perfectly match your aperitifs, ambience and inner sense of gastronomic paradise.

name: Putien
description:
The PUTIEN brand traces its roots to its namesake city of Putian – a beautiful coastal suburb in Fujian, with rich cultural history and storied tradition since its settlement over almost one and a half millennium ago. It is, after all, the birthplace of the goddess Mazu and the fabled Southern Shaolin Kungfu, among many other legendary tales.
PUTIEN focused on providing lip-smacking good food . The savoury satisfaction of white hot, luscious Putien Lor Mee broth. Or the sweet-savoury delightful crunch of every piece of stir-fried Yam. Or how the prawns, scallops and fishes used in their creations still taste as sweet as the sea intended.

name: The Coffee Academics
description: Since its inauguration in Hong Kong in 2012, The Coffee Academics has been setting the standards in coffee quality and exceptional coffee experiences. Taking specialty coffee culture to new heights in the region, the cafe has expanded our coffee hub to include Singapore, Thailand, Mainland China, Macau, Philippines, Japan and Qatar.

name: Tokyo Milk Cheese Factory
description:
Their concept of a “factory filled with creativity and innovation” was born in Japan in 2011. They wanted to create sweets that no one has ever made, using carefully selected milk and high quality cheese, combined with ingredients from not only Japan, but also around the world.

First launched in Japan in 2016, Cow Cow Ice is literally their Crème de la crème. Made using premium ingredients such as authentic Jersey Milk, Cream cheese and Gouda cheese from Hokkaido, Cow Cow Ice’s smooth creaminess is a joy to behold.

There are a total of 3 flavors: Cow Cow Milk, Cow Cow Cheese and Cow Cow Twist (Milk & Cheese). The Signature Cow Cow Sundae (served in a cup) includes a slice of our Milk Cheesecake as well as a piece of Salt & Camembert cookie, completing the ultimate taste experience.

Vintage cheddar Waffle cone is also baked carefully one by one in the shop to ensure quality over quantity.

name: Calia
description:
Calia is a unique Australian restaurant-to-retail brand created in 2016 in Melbourne celebrating the finest in local Australian and international produce – both in the restaurant and in the adjoining retail marketplace.
A balance of experience and excellence, Calia is driven by the pursuit of perfection for the modern gastronomist. At the heart of the brand, we believe that simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. We have captured the quintessence of nature’s nest in our selection of products, to delight even the most conscientious of palates.

name: dipndip
description: dipndip is the ultimate chocolate café. Using only the finest Belgian chocolate, they offer countless choices of dessert items and beverages that ranges from crêpes, to waffles, to traditional hot chocolate. Whether it is white, milk or dark, they have something for every chocolate lover.

name: Warung Putera Puteri
description: Experience the heartwarming flavors of Malaysia in every bite, where our dishes are crafted to make you feel right at home.

name: Venchi
description:
All delicious, healthy, natural, made with the best ingredients and the best intentions: to look on the bright side and to live a long happy life that, if nothing else, is a little bit sweeter.
With more than 140 years of history, today Venchi earned international recognition: with more than 350 chocolate recipes and 90 gelato flavours, is found in more than 70 countries in key cities like London, Hong Kong, Dubai and New York with the biggest chocolate waterfall of all time. On this journey towards international expansion, Venchi recently landed in Taiwan, Jakarta, Shanghai and Tokyo in the name of beauty, joy and conviviality, turning “Made in Italy” into “Experienced like in Italy” and exceeding 150 shops worldwide!
Pavilion Luxe:Enjoy 10% off normal-priced items.*(Click for more info)
*Terms and conditions apply
Tourist Privilege:Enjoy 5% tourists discount.(Click for more info)
*Discount is applicable only to full-priced items and does not include gelato

name: Village Roast Duck
description:
Village Roast Duck started in 2010, established itself as the place to go for succulent Peking Roast Duck, Crispy Duck, Char Siew (caramelized pork belly) and Siew Yuk.
We pride ourselves as the place for authentic Cantonese dishes. The use of high quality ingredients and condiments ensure each of our dishes is a treat.

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf (Level 2)
description: Coffee Bean offers over 22 varieties of coffee and 20 kinds of tea. Its’ signature drink is the Original Ice Blend which are available in Mocha, Caramel, Hazelnut, etc. Coffee Bean’s dedication is to excellence and quality, promising a cup of great coffee. Enjoy the smooth creamy coffee and some pastries to satisfy the sweet tooth.

name: Light Capture Café
description: Light Capture Café is the perfect place to relax and enjoy a cup of coffee or tea with a pastry. Decorated in a warm and inviting style, with soft lighting and comfortable seating with outdoor patio, Light Capture Café at Pavilion KL is the second branch to open in KL.

name: Koi Thé
description: The story begins 25 years ago when the first 50 Lan store was established in Taiwan and grown into a market leader in delivering premium tea beverage.In 2006, from the same parentage as 50 Lan, KOI was founded to bring the success onto international platform with first overseas store in Singapore.Today KOI direct manages over 400 outlets in 12 countries, making tea-tasting a pleasant experience for everyone.

name: J.CO Donuts & Coffee
description:
J.Co Donuts & Coffee offers a line of unique flavor donuts and beverages to customers like they’ve never tasted before.
Best ingredients are used from all over the world such as Belgian Chocolates, Californian Almonds, Japanese Matcha Green Tea and Italian roasted coffee to give you the fine taste.

name: PAUL
description:
PAUL, THE FRENCH BAKERY RESTAURANT
PAUL is a 129 years French family business originates from Lille in North of France opened it’s first and only PAUL outlet in Malaysia at Pavilion KL. It aims to spread authentic PAUL french experience and gives you the opportunity to appreciate French culture and heritage through its French products (bread, crepes, sandwiches, macarons, pastries, coffee and more).
1. Special Feature: PAUL Trio-cation

Being in PAUL, there are actually 3 different segments to choose from based on personal preference in terms of ambiance. First, is the main restaurant where the setting has an elegant Parisian feel with French music playing at the background. There is also a private room available for events that can accommodate up to 40 pax. To make reservations, call +603-2145 6000.
The second section is the Terrace for a casual bite. The final section is a kiosk made for take-away where you can select an array of tantalizing pastries, bread together with a hot cuppa on-the-go.
2. Dessert Swig: Sugar Rush High

For the adventurous sweet-tooth, venture to a whole new world of ice blended drinks – The Macaron Frappé where macarons are blended together with vanilla cream, ice and milk to create a sinfully sweet and addictive concoction. You can also choose other macaron flavours such as chocolate, pistachio, coffee, vanilla or salted caramel.
3. Cheesy Bite: Discover ‘Pain De Mie’

One of the most authentic Parisian Cafe dish – The Croque Monsieur is the perfect dish to really appreciate the house-baked ‘Pain De Mie’ which means soft bread.
Turkey ham and French cheese – Emmental and Béchamel cheese, melted into a gooey surprise are baked together to create a melty cheesy savoury dish.
4. Dainty Bite: 2 Bites Rule

We heard that Tartine dish is pretty rare in the French restaurant scene in Malaysia. At PAUL, savour the Tartine Beef, where freshly baked country bread is cut into ‘two bites’ pieces, topped with fragrant herbed cream cheese, sweet caramalised onion and juicy grilled sirloin steak with a dash of tangy balsamic glazing. The key of this dish is that it’s a great sharing appetizer that plays well with different food component textures.
5. Fusion Bite: Why Not Pumpkin

There’s always that one person that has a different taste from the crowd. So, for those who want to savour a unique but low-key Parisian dish, here’s the Seafood Risotto. Risotto is usually cooked in a mushroom base but here the risotto prepared in a pumpkin base that brings out the natural sweetness of the pumpkin, it also has grilled king prawn, roasted salmon, squid, cherry tomatoes, sauteed mixed mushroom, parmesan cheese, and of course, the house-baked baguette crouton for that little Parisian touch.
6. Crackling Bite: Caramelised Layers

One of the sweet favourite – The Millefeuille Strawberry a.k.a napoleon is where caramalised puff pastries ate layered with a thick creme patisserie filling and fresh strawberries. This dessert needs precision in measurements and preparation as it takes real skills to ace it, the main goal at the end of the day is to maintain the crunchiness of the pastry. It has a harmonious flavour that springs between sweet caramel and tangy strawberries, neutralised by the creme patisserie.
All pastries and bread are made fresh everyday using the finest French flour (a secret blend from PAUL’s recipe archives) and French butter which is the core of the dishes served.
7. Tea Bite: XXXL Version

The macarons served in PAUL is slightly different than usual as the size is huge, almost 5 times bigger than usual, hinting a purpose to share, or not. The macarons are made from almond flour to have a light and nutty aftertaste as has filling that is much more thicker than the usual macarons. It has a richer and more dense texture and flavour that is deliciously chewier.
Pavilion Lifestyle and Priority:Enjoy 10% off with minimum purchase of RM100.(Click for more info)
Pavilion Luxe:Enjoy 15% off with minimum purchase of RM100.(Click for more info)
T&Cs: Valid for takeaway and dine in only.

name: Komugi
description:
Komugi (Halal) offers a variety of deliciously authentic products, from handmade Japanese bread to delightfuland delectablecakes and pastries.
Komugi (Halal) offers a variety of deliciously authentic products, from handmade Japanese bread to delightfuland delectablecakes and pastries.

name: Auntie Anne’s
description: Guaranteed to be a snacking pleasure, Auntie Anne’s, a famous American chain since 1988, serves products such as pretzels, dips, and beverages. The fresh, sweet taste coupled with a light, bread-like texture of the various flavored pretzel offers individuals a ’little reward’. Other than Stix and Pretzel Dogs, customers can choose from its core product lineup which includes Original, Cinnamon Sugar, Almond, Pepperoni, Sour Cream and Onion, Garlic Pretzels – also available in bite-size Pretzel Nuggets. Complemented with the brand’s famous lemonade, Auntie Anne’s is definitely the pit stop to make.

name: Bubu Kōbō
description: Dive into the world of “Bubu Kōbō” with our star attraction – the Japanese Mont Blanc Dessert.

name: Al Halabi Gourmet Restaurant
description:
Al Halabi Gourmet Restaurant is ideal for  dining as well as romantic dinners for two, with an inviting façade and nicely designed interior, vintage  and chandeliers with warm lighting, will truly exude the feel of an authentic Middle East vibe.
Menu wise, you can look forward to an array of Arabic staples and gourmet foods. It’s predominantly Lebanese & Syrian dishes, and it’s fairly extensive. Meticulously made dishes are served perfectly in  platter. Founded by the great man behind the success of the famous Restaurant Tarbush, this new concept of gourmet restaurant guarantees a gastronomic twist of taste and a modern update on traditional Arabic cooking.

Pavilion Junior Privilege:10% off with purchase of RM100 in a single receipt.(Click for more info)

name: Frost n Bites
description: Frost N Bites started at the end of 2021 with a major rebranding with new flavours and toppings to boost to match its new theme. They have artisanal produced gelato, topped with a delicious variety of sauces, custom made biscuits, crumbles, and cream.Frost N Bites works hard to offer parlours and customers the very best produce with the constant search for increasingly innovative solutions and creativity.

name: TWG Tea
description:
TWG Tea, the finest luxury tea brand in the world, offers more than 450 fine harvest teas from around the world as well as exclusive tea blends, vibrantly colourful packaged teas, an array of gifts sets for any occasion. The Boutique also offers TWG Tea-infused chocolate bons bons, chocolate bars and macarons. Enjoy and relax in the elegant adjoining TWG Tea Salon for breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner, where crisp white linens and fine bone china complement sweet and savoury tea-infused gastronomy.
Pavilion Luxe:Enjoy a complimentary 6 pieces of TWG tea macarons with a minimum spend of RM250 in a single receipt.(Click for more info)– Year Long Privileges start 1/1/2023

name: Snowflake
description: Snowflake is the perfect place to grab some shaved ice, regardless of the weather! Inspired by traditional Taiwanese desserts, you have a whole menu of fun options made-to-order and they are all made special with fresh, natural ingredients. Choose from refreshing fruity or creamy shaved ice, to delectable matcha series or signature taroballs, there’s something for you to enjoy. Plan your next meet-up at Snowflake.

name: Famous Amos
description:
Being the purveyor of freshly baked cookies, Famous Amos has been serving nation favourite cookies for more than 35 years and still counting. The ever-popular flavor among cookies fans is our Original Chocolate Chip cookies, other favorites such as Chocolate Chip Macadamia, Double Chocolate Chip Pecan, Chocolate Chip Pecan are freshly baked throughout the day in each of this Hot-baked store. By using the best ingredients, like semi-sweet chocolate chips and flavorful nuts, these homemade-tasting cookies became famous just by word of mouth. Famous Amos has also extended its product offerings to wide variety of chocolates, cookie gift packing and gift hampers which are well sought-after gifts for any occasion and social gathering.
